p: Albumin is not produced intrathecally and therefore the ratio of CSF to serum albumin concentration, or Q Alb, is constant in healthy individuals, and less than 9.0. When the BBB is damaged albumin leaks into the CSF and the albumin concentration increases. The Q Alb reflects the degree of damage: if it is more than 100 then there is almost total breakdown of the BBB [ 33].
